safetyTips: Minimal handling with washed/sanitized hands. Contactless doorstep delivery.
name: KIPPY'S PAINT YOUR OWN POTTERY
description: Kippy’s the Paint your own studio from the town centre has gone mobile! We offer ‘Take & Create’ pottery kits to either paint or foam clay. Paint at home boxes for families. Contactless delivery and collection. Order via Facebook Messenger.
